Key.value: Affects the percentage increase of Spell Power and Magical Сrit Multiplier, increases with Hero's level.
Affects amount of Mana, Regeneration of Mana and Magical Crit Chance, increases with Hero's level.
Affects the percentage increase of Attack Power and Physical Crit Multiplier, increases with Hero's level.
Affects Attack Speed and Physical Сrit Chance, increases with Hero's level.
Affects Tenacity, amount of Health and Health Regeneration, increases with Hero's level.
